metadata.title: CVE-2021-47017 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ath10k:Fix a use after free in ath10k_htc_send_bundle In ath10k_htc_send_bundle,the bundle_skb could be freed by dev_kfree_skb_any(bundle_skb). But thebundle_skb is used later by bundle_skb->len. As skb_len = bundle_skb->len,my patch replaces bundle_skb->len to skb_len after the bundle_skb wasfreed.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
